Closed issue "Change iframe src more than once ,  will not back to previous page" (#1917) at vuejs/vue-router
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version
3.0.1

### Reproduction link
[http://jsbin.com/hikorawipa/edit?html,output](http://jsbin.com/hikorawipa/edit?html,output)

### Steps to reproduce
- Home to Iframe
- Click Bootstrap, loaded
- Click Vue, loaded
- Click Back button(go(-1)), will not back to Home, but the Bootstrap

![bug](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11537595/33467812-37895d76-d692-11e7-8f17-b0a9374198cb.gif)


### What is expected?
Do not push iframe history into router

### What is actually happening?
If change iframe src more than once (loaded),  then `go(-1)` will not back to previous page

---
- find in v2.2.0, v3.0.1 too
- Chrome 62.0.3202.94

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "router.beforeEach 方法里 怎么跳到外部链接" (#1919) at vuejs/vue-router
Events.RelatedBody: 我的需求是： 当我进入某个页面时，需要判断一个cookie 里面是否有token 存在，如果cookie 中没有token存在，那么久要给用户一个提示，并跳转到  另外的域名下，进行登录。 登录页和我的项目部在一个域名下， 我在使用router.beforeEach  的 path 只能跳转到当前域名下的页面
